评论详情: The graphic on this tank top is beautiful, and the fit is good. However, the fabric is a very stretchy and uncomfortable polyester/synthetic.

It’s true to size and design. Originally it said it would take a month to arrive but came in two weeks. The print was very pretty and it’s good for the value of money. I would say it’s a little thin but if you get a darker color it shouldn’t be a problem! You can’t see bra line underneath so it’s not too thin. Great tank top! My friend loved it as her Christmas gift. I got it from her Pinterest board. She just got into soft goth and I think this shirt is perfect!
perfect

评论概述: SO CUTE AND NOT TOO CROPPED
评论详情: this top is soft and fits really well. I bought a size large (36D) and it looks great. It’s not too short, which is a problem I have with crop tops. The print is also really cute and I get a lot of compliments on it.

I bought this shirt due to the grunge and unusual design and fell in love with it! Upon arrival I was slightly displeased with the texture as it was definitely more plastic feeling than what I was expecting. All in all, the shirt is more than comfortable to wear and washes well without any damage to the print or fabric. I’d say get a size larger than normal, as it fits me a bit tight and rides up my stomach a bit due to the texture of the shirt. The price point is definitely worth it for the quality and longevity of the shirt. 7.5/10 would recommend!

So I'm 5'7", around 185-190 pounds, 42 inch bust, 36 inch waist and about 19 inch wide shoulders (though that doesn't matter as much for a sleeveless top) and I got a large.  It has a nice, smooth feeling fabric (not see through at all!) with a clear print. Perfect crop top size! Will stop at the top of high waisted pants, or give a peek of your belly button with lower rise.
My daughter was pleased with the style and unique artwork. It has held up well in the laundry and no signs of fading or peeling.
This top is so nice, it fits well and the size is a tiny but small, but honestly it squeezes the right places for me without being uncomfortable.
Fits but falls weird on large chests. Material is similar to a swimsuit, but not as stretchy. If you have DD+, it fits more like a bra than a shirt.
Cool shirt for the price!
Super cute, lightweight, and comfortable. One of my go-to shirts

I love this top. The fabric is soft, breathable, and just feels high quality in general. I got a lot of compliments on this one. Definitely true to size.  Larger bust at the moment thanks to breastfeeding (38DDD) but there's enough stretch that my pre-baby size, XL, still fit perfectly! Feels like this one will really last!!
Great product,  fits her very well,  very sexy,  I approve 10/10 fellas.
Pretty thin and tore easy but other than that i love it!
It has a really soft stretch material that I absolutely love, and it's so incredibly cute on

I would usually order a large but based on reviews I ordered a size up, and I’m glad I did. It’s stretchy material but ordering a size up will give you a little more length. It’s still cropped but ends just above the belly button.

We are not just talking an average cropped top - this is super cropped. Even with high waisted pants my whole mid section to just under my bra line is exposed. The material is thin and the arm holes are wide, so bras will show. Maybe you could layer this but I’m returning.

评论概述: Maybe buy a couple sizes up
评论详情: The material is soft, however, I would definitely recommend buying a couple sizes up just in lieu of the type of material it is.

It's perfect, the fabric is nice and breathable but not so thin that you can see through it! It looks exactly like it does in the photo, color and all! Size is perfect as well, it is pretty stretchy so if you wanted a tight fit you could go down a size
sizing is good! digs into armpits just a little bit but it doesn’t bother me. looks just like the picture :)

This shirt is very cute! It’s printed very well and the material is stretchy and breathable! The only cons I have about this shirt is that it does ride up and it arrived a little dusty but once washed it’s gone! Overall a very good shirt!
Great product.  Came super fast.  Love it

I really liked the tank top, I’m usually insecure wearing tank tops but this one was nice! It is very cute and stretchy, I recommend if you want something breathable and comfy! Overall this product was very nice! 10/10
I love this shirt it fits well and is very cute
The quality and fit is good! The material it’s made out of is very breathable. It’s also so cute!

I bought this for my 11 year old.  It is super cute and she loves it BUT you can see the side of her bra through the arm holes…. Like a good 1/2-1” on both sides.  She is a B cup.  The shirt fits well other than that… but it is kind of a big deal so I gave it 3 stars.  Otherwise would have been 4 because it is fast fashion.

评论概述: Super Soft, Comfortable for long term wear
评论详情: The material this shirt is made of is like a wifebeater shirt, it's soft so you can wear it out or even wear it as PJs. Sizing is accurate and I'd definitely recommend this to people with similar clothing styles as me.
im an L, ordered an xl, it fits like a large. i know its made to be tight, thats why i got it but damn it is tinyyyy
cheap feeling material

I was really worried this was going to end up being badly printed or uncomfortable material but neither of those were true. While it's not the material I was expecting, it is still comfortable. Sort of a sporty feel I suppose. And the design looks rad.
It's cute, material is weird, but I like it well enough.
I ordered an XL but it showed up looking like an XS.
Looks exactly like the pictures, the material is very similar to that of a swimsuit. It's super stretchy and comfy!

评论概述: Get a size up, good quality
评论详情: The quality of the vest/shirt is nice and the texture is good. I got a size up because that’s how I like my clothes but turns out the size I got was a perfect fit instead of being larger. The design is like on the photos and a nice texture as well. And I wear this shirt almost every other day, I baby this shirt.
Order one size up for a fitted look.  It runs pretty small. Material was swimsuit like. Pattern exactly as shown. Color was also exactly as shown.
It feels like good quality, it's soft and fits great.
Not really worth it for that price, it's very thin and seems not the best quality but if you really like the design I'd say get it :)

I like the slippery material, the print is decent quality, and the fit is slightly better than I was afraid of. It's not as long as I was hoping but there's also a little too much room on the side boob, so that's probably because I'm a little too busty. I followed the advice in comments and sized up, I'm usually extra small or small and I got medium, which is good. I am currently 5'3" and 115lbs, w DD cups. The color is what I expected (olive) and the stitching isn't perfect but I think it's a little more punk that way. :) if you think 30 bucks is too much then you're probably right but I like the style and I'm very happy I bought it.
